translations.navBarText: Your phone is not a destination. It’s a start.
translations.exploreText2: Rediscover real social networking with Lomads.
translations.exploreText4: The world’s first application that invites you to put your phone down and enjoy something far more interesting - life, people and interests…
translations.FindYourCommunityText: Participate in events or activities that you are passionate about, wherever you are.
translations.StayInTouchText: Expand your network, exchange messages and stay in touch with clutter-free chats.
translations.GrowTogetherText: Set-up organized meet-ups using our custom tools for different activities.
translations.PersonalizeSuggestionsText: events and groups, selected according to your tastes, and nearby.
translations.ChatandMakePlansText: It’s not just a vanilla chat. It’s polling for time-slots, proposing to go together, booking events, and accessing all important information in one power-packed chat !
translations.ManageYourCalendarText: Once you sign-up for an event, it gets added to your Lomads calendar along with any calendar of your choice.
translations.GetActionNotificationsText: Whether it’s friends who want you to join their group or include you in their plan, you can put everything into action with our purposeful notifications.
translations.DiffSectionSubText1: We are dealing with precious moments of your life. We can’t just leave it all to the algorithms. That’s why we carefully select only high-quality groups and events on Lomads.
translations.DiffSectionSubText2: Social platforms based on advertising revenue models are optimized to keep users hooked online. Lomads earns revenue from events. So, when you go out, go offline and have a good time, we actually love it! That’s why we’ve designed our platform to get you what you want and as quickly as possible.
translations.DiffSectionSubText3: User privacy and security is at the core of everything we do. We don’t monetize your information. We don’t use or share it without your explicit and informed consent.
translations.ContactUsSectionText1: The phone is only a means, not an end.
translations.ContactUsSectionText2: Tools and advice to organize your own events
